name: Define Future
description:
Define Future is a 2D oblique shooter. You play as generic hooded man, the unlucky victim who gets abducted by PEOPLE FROM THE FUTURE! You must utilise your skills to navigate your way through the maze like interior of the spaceship. Shot and sneak your way round. Try and escape while enemies stalk the halls and along the way find out what the future holds for the human race.

The game is currently in its early stages and still has a long way to go.

Features:

-2D shooter in the oblique perspective.

-Aiming and shooting via mouse controls in full 360 degrees

-Elements of ammunition management

-Stealth is a viable way of play
